page.description: The {PROGRESS} command displays a progress bar.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: Numeric. Width of the bar in columns.

argument.name: Variable
argument.description: Numeric. The variable whose progress (from 0 to 100) is being plotted).

section.title: Example
section.example:
num = 0 caption = "" ui_dlg_box("Progress",<<%dlg% {text=80caption}; {interval=0.1} {timer=timer} {progress=80num}; {line=1};
%dlg% , <<%code% if a_dlg_button = "timer" then a_dlg_button = "" if num < 100 then num = num+1 caption = "Progress ("+num+"%)" else caption = "Done" end if else if a_dlg_button = "reset" then a_dlg_button = "" num = 0 end if %code%)
